snippet: Columbus, Ohio, insists there's lot of there there -- and the city wants to expose its charms to the world. Here are the ways other cities have branded themselves -- slogans to make you go hmmm.      LAS VEGAS
abstract: Some cities are trying to burnish their image with new slogans; list of successful slogans; photo (S)
